description: [Funkfeuer](http://funkfeuer.at/) is, just like Freifunk, a non commercial initiative for free wireless mesh networks. Funkfeuer is based in Austria and uses [OpenWRT](http://www.openwrt.net) as the firmware for the Routers.
name: Funkfeuer

ohloh.description: The CouchDB server design document for LibreMap - a scalable, global and decentralized router database and map visualization for community networks, such as guifi, Altermundi, FunkFeuer, ninux, freifunk, Commotion...
ohloh.name: libremap-api
